topics.name: Cardiovascular
topics.query_fragment: "cardiovascular disease"[tiab] OR atherosclerosis[tiab] OR "coronary artery disease"[tiab] OR ApoB[tiab] OR "Lp(a)"[tiab] OR PCSK9[tiab] OR "heart failure"[tiab]

topics.name: Metabolism
topics.query_fragment: "insulin resistance"[tiab] OR hyperinsulinemia[tiab] OR "metabolic syndrome"[tiab] OR "GLP-1"[tiab] OR SGLT2[tiab] OR acarbose[tiab] OR "glucose variability"[tiab] OR CGM[tiab]

topics.name: Exercise
topics.query_fragment: exercise[tiab] OR "physical activity"[tiab] OR "resistance training"[tiab] OR HIIT[tiab] OR VO2[tiab] OR "zone 2"[tiab] OR "cardiorespiratory fitness"[tiab]

topics.name: Sleep
topics.query_fragment: sleep[tiab] OR "sleep apnea"[tiab] OR circadian[tiab] OR melatonin[tiab] OR CPAP[tiab] OR insomnia[tiab]

topics.name: Neurodegeneration
topics.query_fragment: dementia[tiab] OR "Alzheimer disease"[tiab] OR neurodegeneration[tiab] OR "cognitive decline"[tiab] OR "brain aging"[tiab]

topics.name: Senolytics
topics.query_fragment: senolytic*[tiab] OR senescence[tiab] OR "senescent cells"[tiab] OR dasatinib[tiab] OR quercetin[tiab] OR fisetin[tiab]

topics.name: mTOR & Rapamycin
topics.query_fragment: rapamycin[tiab] OR "mTOR"[tiab] OR sirolimus[tiab] OR everolimus[tiab]

topics.name: Biomarkers & Clocks
topics.query_fragment: "epigenetic clock"[tiab] OR "DNA methylation"[tiab] OR proteomic*[tiab] OR metabolomic*[tiab] OR biomarker*[tiab] OR "biological age"[tiab]

topics.name: Fasting & CR
topics.query_fragment: "caloric restriction"[tiab] OR "intermittent fasting"[tiab] OR fasting[tiab] OR "time-restricted eating"[tiab] OR autophagy[tiab]

topics.name: NAD+ & Sirtuins
topics.query_fragment: NAD[tiab] OR NMN[tiab] OR "nicotinamide riboside"[tiab] OR sirtuin*[tiab] OR SIRT1[tiab]

topics.name: Hormones & HRT
topics.query_fragment: testosterone[tiab] OR "hormone replacement"[tiab] OR estrogen[tiab] OR DHEA[tiab] OR "growth hormone"[tiab]

topics.name: Cancer Screening
topics.query_fragment: "cancer screening"[tiab] OR colonoscopy[tiab] OR "liquid biopsy"[tiab] OR "early detection"[tiab]

topics.name: Bone Health
topics.query_fragment: osteoporosis[tiab] OR "bone density"[tiab] OR "bone mineral"[tiab] OR fracture[tiab]

topics.name: Supplements
topics.query_fragment: spermidine[tiab] OR "omega-3"[tiab] OR "fish oil"[tiab] OR "vitamin D"[tiab] OR creatine[tiab]
